name: eat shmoogle
text: Custom cauliflower crust vegan happiness.  Go, free your allergens

name: Janie Plendl
text: The pizza was good. However, the employees and service was absolutely terrible. Employees were yelling, and very forceful in trying to hurry us. This was our first time here and we were very confused. As we were waiting for our pizzas to …More

name: Lane Mead
text: Good pizza & good service. We had particular dietary needs in our group & they were knowledgeable & helpful with their suggestions.

name: Marya Onion
text: One of the only places around to offer vegan pizza. Easy ordering, great  points system/app, no extra charge for as many toppings as you like, no upcharge for vegan cheese and chorizo, delicious crust, good prices. I have to say this Ames …More

name: Carl Frame
text: Thought blaze would be a good date night idea. It wasn’t... first I watched the cook drop the big spatula to move all the pizzas in the oven on the ground. He then proceeded to use that same one to take my burnt pizza out. Going to smokin oak from now on.

name: Robert Weisbrod
text: Huge choice of toppings sauces and cheeses. Highly recommend

name: Allison Berg
text: First of all, when we submit an order for curbside pickup, the whole idea is that it is CURBSIDE. The person on the phone when we called asked if we could come in. Ok... Sure. Next, we had to wait at least five minutes before finally …More

name: Lateef
text:
Build your own pizza.
I liked the experience, plenty of options.

name: Jotin Musoke
text: Delicious chicken pizza! The kids enjoyed it.. Would love to go back.

name: Robert Russell
text: I love this place. One of my favorite places to eat in all of Ames.

name: Cameron Mohne
text: Friends pizzas were fine, but mine was extra salty beyond what it normally is with the sea salt addition. The pizza felt almost inedible at some spots but I believe I may have just been unlucky. With all of that said, I prefer the consistency of the Des Moines chain over Ames'.

name: Derek Hanson
text: We took the kids for the first time in a long while because of everything being shut down. We had the best young man who was so nice and helpful. He made sure all of our food was exactly right. He brought it to our table outside because the …More

name: Kenzie Kelso
text: Pizza is good, but it is always always burnt. They have 1 person monitoring 8 plus pizzas, cutting and handing them out. I have watched my pizza burn while they are cutting others. Gave them so many chances to redeem themselves, but I stopped going.

name: Ryan Patterson
text: Sometimes gets slow/chaotic when busy, slightly overpriced but overall good food and service

name: damarcus ogletree
text: One of the BEST pizzas I've ever eaten!!!! I'm originally from Chicago. I now live in Georgia. There is a Pie5 pizza near me that's similar to Blaze but Blaze is soooo much better tasting. Very nice lively atmosphere. Nice customer service …More

name: simran patel
text: The pizza has a great smoky flavor and the vegan cheese is amazing

name: Anna Duncan
text: I had a woman who was very stern and rude to me while dressing my pizza. She had a very sarcastic and amused tone. Not to mention her mask didn’t cover her nose. She made me feel unwelcomed and stupid,

name: Gourab Bhaskar
text: You can make your own pizza here. I tried “Green stripes” and “link in” and those were really tasty. I would highly recommend this place.

name: Cory Newell
text: Good food, good price. Allergy friendly.

name: Katherine Lundberg
text: COVID-specific review: This location is providing dine-in. I went expecting a safe and properly distanced pizza pick-up and had to meander through unmasked patrons dining in. This is frustrating as I chose this lunch option because the webpage said it was only allowing carry-out and delivery.

name: Matthew Long
text: Great Brick Oven Pizza. Tons of topping options.

name: Jim Crabb
text: Tried Blaze Pizza tonight, billed as a "build your own" personal sized pizza place, it was pretty good. While you dont actually "build it" yourself, the workers do, they are very freindly, and helpful. The ingredients were high quality, …More

name: Dakota Karthan
text: I'm addicted to this place. It's quick, easy, and yummy. They rotate out their drinks often and you can always count on the pizza tasting great. Ingredients are fresh and I always walk out happy. The only downside is the slightly small space.

name: Laily Banwart
text: The staff is very friendly and the ordering process is streamlined and easy.  Food quality was above expectations!  Will definitely return.

name: Nate Warwick
text: Fast friendly service,  restaurant is clean and well kept. Great selection of toppings for you pizza and several crust choices as well. I will be back.

name: Melissa Aymond
text: Friendly staff, quick service, lots of options, great crust.

name: Tracy Alvarez-Cuebas
text: AMAZING pizza! Cheap prices- great toppings choices. Definitely will be back !

name: Edward Obrien
text: A wide selection of pizzas including gluten free options.  Fast and friendly staff with great service.  Whether you eat in or takenout, it's a great place to eat.

name: Eric Weber
text: Was a great find, didn’t know we had an establishment with dairy free or vegan pizza available.   The best surprise, great flavor with lots of options for toppings with options for vegan, gluten free, dairy free, and the customary cheese …More

name: Nick Behrens
text: Good pizza.  Nice topping options.   Bit pricey

name: Sophie Potter
text: Amazing pizza, toppings, and variety! Thin crust pizza, with many variety of toppings and also amazing fresh drinks like lemonade and blood orange lemonade! highly recommend and definitely one of the best restaurants in ames, iowa.

name: Joshua DeGroot
text: The food was really good. I was left wanting a little more though. Based on the menu it appeared as though I was limited to two toppings on my pizza even though it was a build your own. They put a limited amount of toppings and cheese on …More

name: Travis Lenig
text: Friendly staff  quick easy good pizza

name: diwakar awate
text: Expensive but the most delicious pizza you can get in Ames, they got a large variety of toppings as compared to other pizza stores.

name: Matthew Strauser
text: Love the idea that you don't have to pay for extra toppings. The 3 minute pizza cook time is also a huge plus. This was my first time but I'll be back.

name: Rachel Harms
text: Pizza is always great and the prices good but man I have never had a good experience with the staff. Today’s experience was especially rough with one staff member on his phone for 90% of the interaction and the other slinging pizzas so …More

name: Sarah Potter
text: absolutely love this place. my favorite restaurant in ames. i️ do not recommend the gluten free unless you have to as it is very thin and gets quite burnt in their wood fired oven. build your own is amazing, unlimited toppings for one set price. i️ come here all the time!

name: Sheldon Mattson
text: Great atmosphere, food is amazing, and usually pretty quick. Love their blood orange lemonade too. Enjoy eating there every time. Only pain is the parking, but that's more a city issue (or just get it delivered or order ahead for pickup).

name: Brandon F.
text: The pizza here is fantastic! They have a wide selection of toppings that are very fresh. This place can get VERY busy around lunchtime BUT, ordering using the app is a godsend and speeds up the process tremendously as opposed to waiting in …More

name: xanthor deeds
text:
Don’t place an online order
I waited three hours and they didn’t deliver or refund me.

name: Tara Gregg
text: Pizza is always good, love that you watch them put everything on in front of you. Chocolate chip brownie is also a must!!

name: Gabe
text: The staff here have gone above and beyond during our visits. They've put in extra time and effort to ensure our unique dietary needs were met. The pizza was fast and  delicious, and the atmosphere relaxed and friendly. Blaze Pizza is highly recommended.

name: Nick Wilson
text: Highly recommend Blaze to anyone who enjoys pizza. I understand it's a chain and becoming more popular but there is definitely reasons that this place is beating out the competition in the over populated wood fire pizza scene. …More

name: Renee Jones
text: Extremely delicious pizza. Made to order with lots of topping choices

name: Erik Donner
text: Great pizza, awesome staff working there! And they have freshly made gluten free pizza, too. The press out the fresh dough and do their best to prevent cross contamination.

name: M Bergman
text: We love Blaze Pizza...and who wouldn’t...everyone can get their own pizza their way!!  And if your like me there’s leftovers for lunch the next day...2 meals for one price!!  And the leftovers are even great cold outta the fridge!  Love that have a gluten free option and are truly concerned about not cross contamination.

name: Darian Everding
text: Amazing variety of toppings, super friendly staff. And cauliflower crust!!

name: Jeremy Bever
text: The Subway of pizza shops. The pizzas were delicious, fast, and very reasonably priced. Dough press and classic style oven, neat experience.

name: Heather Snyder
text: Great, fast pizza. And kid friendly dining.

name: Stephanie
text: I've been to multiple Blaze locations and enjoyed my experience each time. This place was incredibly clean with quick service and friendly staff. Build-your-own pizzas are a must order!

name: Becky Wiers
text: The garlic knot things were really good. I like that the pizza is put together fresh and made to order. It tasted great, for sure. The crust doesn't get as stiff/crispy as when it's baked normally versus fast fired, so my husband was a …More

name: De Yuan
text: Man, what else can I say about this pizza. Fully customizable according to your palette and you don’t have to break the bank for the pizza. Worth going.

name: Noa Finken
text: The pizza here is okay. The crust is very thin, which I’m personally not a fan of. It’s a build your own pizza type of place. You hardly have to wait for your pizza, which is nice. By the time you’re done paying, it’s about ready. However, …More

name: Jill Olson
text: Very quick..wood fired.. delicious!!! First time there..everyone very helpful!!!!

name: Sam Lavin
text: Really friendly staff that know how to make good pizza quickly and efficiently.

name: vũ dương
text: Went to blade pizza twice. The first time they charged me $9 for HALF a meat eater. Not only it was overprice, the pizza was also terribly burned. All i could taste was the bitter crust. Same for the second trip, but this time they messed up my order and refused to do anything about it.

name: Hosea Dodds
text: Parking can be rather difficult, especially during peak times. Other than that, the food was really good (not quite as good as MOD pizza, but just barely) and the service and wait time were both excellent. Would give 5 stars if parking weren't such a problem.

name: Mollie Schrodi
text: I will never order from here again.  There is no accountability when their delivery services lose the order (when it has already been paid for).  Very risky.  I lost quite a bit of money.

name: Rebecca Evans
text: BLAZE is a fun pizza /salad place with clean simple atmosphere where you design you own pizza and hang with friends.

name: Robbie Erickson
text: I really enjoy the food and staff at this location. Great pizza at a great price point.

name: Amy Bravo
text: Great pizza, great service. If there was a pebbles, they've always made it right

name: Lenka Birosikova
text: Fire baked pizza, many topping to choose from, you can also build your own pizza with as many topping as you want. Besides regular curst, you can choose keto or cauliflower crust if you prefer. All taste great, the price is okay. The size …More

name: Denine Anderson
text: All so friendly. Love the pizza and salads.

name: Jan Birosik
text: What I really like on this place is you can build your own pizza and put on it many good toppings.

name: Blair W
text: Friendly staff, clean restaurant, and fast service

name: Maxwell Slagter
text: So good👌

name: Mark Sinnwell
text: Great wood fired pizza, good for a casual bite to eat.

name: T G
text: This is one of the few places in Ames to get vegan pizza. The price is comparable to a store-bought frozen vegan pizza, but is actually loaded with enough veggies, "cheese," and sauce to make for a satisfying meal.

name: Mo Khaleel
text: Amazing pizza, wish they brush the oven more frequently and not burn the sides

name: Klaus Schüller
text: Small pizza for 9 bucks has unlimited topping option which no one else offers(as far as I know). Even small pizza can fullfil expectations for quantity due to topping and tasty suace options

name: Shrek Wes
text: Great food, only took about 5 or 10 minutes to make, staff was very friendly. Loved it!

name: Anya Denning
text: I love their crisp and thin crust, lots of fresh ingredients to choose from and several different sauce options.  We had the red vine pizza and the ceasar salad and it was wonderful.  The service was very fast even though they were very …More

name: Annika Cousins
text: We are from out of town and family brought us here.  Not only is it delicious, but they were great with food allergies. My sister is celiac and I'm allergic to blue cheese. When we let them know they all changed their gloves and even …More

name: Brad Akin
text: Very thin crusted pizza.  Don't go here if you are looking for a thick crust pizza.  You can think of it like a Subway but for pizza in that you can customize all your topping and sauce choices.

name: Robert Schiers
text: Make your own. Good vegetarian or vegan

name: Avani Khadilkar
text: Wonderfully made custom pizzas served fresh and hot. Very good ambience as well.

name: Scott Schafer
text: Enjoyed the food good variety and fast

name: Linnel Marie
text: One of the best pizzas I have tried!

name: Collin
text: Overall a quality restaurant. Their pizza options are unique and different from other similar chains. Service is good, employees are almost always friendly and willing to make suggestions if you are unsure of what you want. They also work closely with ISU Student Organizations to help them fundraise.

name: Kenzie K
text: Amazing gluten free crust. However, there is cross contamination if you are sensitive to that. They offer a glove change, which is nice. Great service, tasty food.

name: Ashley Senske
text: So, the pizza is good. That's not a problem. It's basic wood-fired pizza with a  particularly good red sauce involved. The mozzarella also seems to be of good quality. …More

name: Jake Rohde
text: I continue to be impressed by this place. Friendly and helpful staff. Great, affordable, customizable pizzas. Food sensitivities are no problem here. Gluten free crust is the same price as the regular, and there's a vegan cheese option. …More

name: Michael Clayton
text: It was my first time eating at a Blaze pizza, the first employee explained how to order,  what the options were and what is popular. Pizza came out quick & was good.

name: Laura Weems
text: Century 21 fun lunch outing to Blaze today, on their $3.14 Pi Day promo....  Incredibly impressed with the service and pizza.  Both were top notch.  I had the Art Lovers - delicious blend of artichokes and a savory red sauce.  The managing trainer was very accomodating and super cheerful despite being crazy busy!  We'll be back!

name: Jodi McGonigle
text: Today was my first visit to Blaze Pizza, and I am impressed! The staff went over-and-above by greeting, assisting and checking on every customer to make sure they were having a great pizza experience. Five stars and two thumbs up from this gal!

name: Felix Cheng
text: This is the best pizza I've eaten in Ames.

name: Chris Jorgensen
text: It’s like Subway but with wood fired pizza. My personal favorite pizza in Ames.

name: Kelly B
text: Been here 4 times and every time it has been good.  The staff has always been great. The food is fresh and tasty. I look forward to my next visit

name: Ben Hertz
text: Great food but somewhat expensive

name: Swetha Bapatla
text: It's a very nice place for a quick bite. But good because of the price, quick service(because of the very high temp oven) and the taste. I'm a vegetarian and for me not getting charged for each topping is the best. Gluten free option! It's all about having so many choices from choosing the base to what to put on the baked pizza.

name: kristi mendoza
text: Yum!  Can't wait to go back! Wish there were more locations!  Ames is the closet to us. .which is about 40 minutes away! Have also gone to the one in Des Moines!

name: Rhuth K
text: Best pizza on the planet !!  i have been to this place so many times. I absoulutely love the pizza here. The interior is also amazing and one can choose to make their own pizza as how one likes it. The addition of drizzle at the top of the pizza makes it more tasty.  Totally love this place.

name: Classical Rips
text: The Subway of pizza places. You build your own, personal pizza exactly the way you want it. Great selection of ingredients, I personally love the ovalini mozzarella!

name: Deb Malsom
text: it was set up like a subway, friendly service, outside tables available.   Okay pizza not crispy enough on the crust.

name: Summer Castillo
text: We had an excellent experience. The employee James did a wonderful job of making sure the pizza was to our liking and creating a great experience! Would definitely go again!

name: Josine
text: The staff is always friendly and the pizza is always well made! Love that you can put on all the toppings you want for one price. The restaurant is clean. Sometimes it can be hard to find a seat if it is busy, and the wait in line can be a bit long too.

name: Elle L
text: Blaze is always good quality and good service when we’ve been here, which is why we keep coming back, even on the 4th of July when it was wildly busy. While it was convenient to be open on the holiday, I can’t help but wonder what kind of …More

name: Matt Borgelt
text: I ordered a 2 topping pizza, it was good. reminds me of mod pizza in Illinois

name: Devesh Mohan
text: Very very solid food. Never been disappointed. Good drinks selection too. They deserve to win, screw smoking oak

name: BlingGoddessBoutique
text: Omg the pizza is amazing and I only waited 5 min for my pizza

name: Ben Dunkerton
text: I found a receipt from smoking oak here

name: Brock Schmitz
text: My favorite pizza place in Ames, hands down. The prices are reasonable, the ingredients are fresh, and they're open late enough to squeeze a few more poor choices into your night. …More

name: Kaitlyn Maass-Arnoult
text: Great tasting food and drinks. Always fresh. Variety of toppings. Can serve every need. They have pizzas, salads, and many drinks to choose from. Create your own pizza has endless possibilities. You can order online or in store. Their …More

name: J.S. Omundson
text: Excellent quick-fired pizza. Thin crust with thicker available for small additional cost. Amazing toppings put together in creative ways though you can build-your-own also. Salads and desserts available too. Even my fussy youngest gave an "Awesome" rating after his pepperoni pizza.

name: Liz Fransen
text: Wonderful pizza! The pizzas are personal size, but I usually can only eat half. They do have boxes though, and the pizzas are great left overs. Expect to spend around 10$ per meal here

name: Bret Lang
text: You can basically make any kind of pizza you want, which is cool, but the crust was burnt and flavorless.

name: Barry Sieh
text: Great pizza and service.

name: Sparki90
text: I don't know why you would go here when smokin oak is better, and barely a block away.

name: Jon Findlay
text: Some of the best dough I've had. Great ingredients. Fast service and cooking. Fairly cheap. Nothing to complain about except maybe the occasional line but it's a popular place so that's gunna happen.

name: Joydeep Bhattacharya
text: Like their imaginative toppings and the garlic-pesto base (as an alternative to tomato). Fast, courteous service.

name: Art Snyder
text: Great pizza. Build it yourself and choose from four sauces. The spicy red with pepperoni is  a good combo. Adding Italian sausage really gives it a kick. Only takes about 6 or 7 minutes to cook and you're eating.  Various beers and soft drinks to choose from. Total cost under $10 .

name: Evelyn Garrison Robertson
text: Good food great service

name: Ms. Juanita Chandler
text: The food was great and the staff was warm and helpful!!! Big shout out to Kevin, the manager!!!

name: Ben Farwell
text: Amazing Pizza! I like that they make it right in front of you, and that there workers are VERY friendly! I hope they never go out of business!

name: Steve Hoshor
text: We've taken several different people to Blaze and all have loved it.  I'm not a huge pizza fan but I love Blaze.  It's on campus so parking can be a challenge when the students are in town and it can get crowded but the wait has never been too long when we've been there.

name: Elizabeth O'Connor
text: Good pizza. Fast service even when really busy!

name: Nolan Jessen
text: This has good, cheap build-your-own pizza. It's especially fantastic as more of a flat bread style pizza. They also work extremely fast and provide delicious toppings. I would easily recomment this to anyone who likes their pizza *just that exact way* or who would like to experiment with something new.

name: K
text: I love all the options here. Very fast service and delicious pizza. They put on heaps of toppings and have a great variety of sauces. Way better than Smokin Oak!

name: Alicia VanCannon
text: It's hard to find vegan cheese options in pizza places and we really appreciated that! Pizza was good, no wait time, price was excellent but best of all the pizza was awesome! This will be a weekly spot for us! Our only complaint would be to add a vegan meat option but we'll take what we can get.

name: Hawley Brent
text: Great food and super friendly service

name: Stefan Rönnkvist
text: College hangout with great pizza

name: armyguy1SG retired
text: Nice place friendly staff. Got there at 6pm on a Friday night, go figure it was busy. The menu had a lot to choose from and the prices weren't out of line.

name: Tiffanie Fix
text: Best gluten free pizza I have ever had

name: Michael Hlavacek
text: Staff was very friendly and helpful. You can pick from a single topping pizza or unlimited topping pizza with a large variety of topping choices. I've visited this location several times and I've always had excellent food and left satisfied.

name: Sagnik Banerjee
text: They serve amazing pizzas and theee is practically no waiting.

name: Rhonda Bowling
text: It was very good..and not expensive!

name: Indy Lo
text: For the fast food pizza trend, this place is top of the line. There are many fresh ingredients and choices for free, and the workers will add as much as you want, even if you ask for borderline ridiculous amounts of cheese and sauce (sorry). Good in-house drinks too; the lemonade and mango beverages are so good.

name: K Ross
text: Delicious gluten free pizza! Love all the options!

name: Kelle Cook
text: Very yummy....love the build your own pizza

name: Erin Hinrichsen
text: One of my favorite places for pizza in Ames! They have a variety of unique toppings, cheeses, and sauces, as well as classic ingredients. It can get pretty busy and the wait can get to be about 15 minutes to just order, but it goes quick once your pizza starts cooking.

name: Tara Andrews
text: It's like Subway but for pizza. The concept works well, and there's plenty of options for you to choose from. This is a fairly new place, and I would have expected a bit better staffing on a Saturday afternoon. They pizza is actually really …More

name: Jamie Butenhoff
text: Great pizza!  Love the concept and great service!  Don't be afraid if the line looks long,  moves fast!

name: Chase
text: Good fast fired pizza. Definitely my favorite shop in this style of pizza shops. Would recommend, take 5-10 minutes total.

name: Tyler Stricker
text: Many options. Super friendly staff. Great location to get a customized pizza for one.

name: Nathaniel Banderman
text: Amazing service!!! There is an amazing person named Scott who works there, I took a few of my friends who are vegan to this location and the service was amazing!!! They took the upmost care of us and the food was also exceptional!!! 10/10 would recommend!!!!

name: Shannon Geisinger
text: My family, including my two kids and my parents, stopped in to Blaze for an early supper. One pie was perfect for two people, in my opinion, unless you are really hungry. Great, fun toppings, my kids could customize one to share to their …More

name: Chris Seymour
text: Good ingredients. Their oven would be better if it used wood not gas. Orders were mixed up. Their menu is sparse but you can craft your own. Will return but not when inonvenient.

name: Kyle Hoffman
text: Great service, cheap pizza, lots of toppings

name: Ferit Karakaya
text: great pizza, a little burnt at the bottom. their App sucks though!

name: Courtney Staudacher
text: Love the idea of a build your own pizza. And it's SO TASTY! Great group of kids working there, too.

name: Michael McRoberts
text: Their pizza is worse than frozen pizza. Piece of cardboard with very little cheese and few topping. Sorry we are out of Hamberger was their excuse. Pizza was $ 9 for a personal size pizza. That is the only size they have. Don' t waste your money on this pizza joint!

name: Peter Carlson
text: Fast and efficient even when packed. The pizza is some of the best in town. Thin crust with tasty toppings. Very good.

name: Darla Ewalt
text: Very good pizza. Parking is a challenge but doable.

name: Chad Baker
text: if the millennials love it so do i! from the generation who gave us back our love of all things communal because of their love of others they have tables exploring friendship love and food. wow! and they said they were pointless.

name: amy welch
text: Tried this for the first time today....Fast, great large arugula berry side salad, delicious  "Green stripe" pizza with chicken and pesto, quite reasonable prices. Loved that you can eat outside. Will return.

name: Marvin Smith
text: Good pizza, fast, and a decent price. Only downside is trying to park if you're not a college student within walking distance.

name: Sara Eastlund
text: I've never tried Blaze pizza before, but this pizza place is awesome! The employees were friendly, the service was amazingly quick and the food was great! Also if you like the pizza sauce from Red's Savoys, the spicy red sauce here is very similar!

name: Billy K
text: I only go here late on Saturdays after in town obligations (live out of town) and usually get two pizzas to go. It's good pizza, fire oven cooked in about 3 minutes. Their gimmick is unlimited toppings for a set price. Lots of unusual toppings, including several olive options and chicken.

name: Tanzeel Ur Rehman
text: Good options. Byop options. Gluten free options.

name: Clayton C
text: The Subway of pizza. They also have weird fancy pops. I'll throw you a five star review for your efforts.

name: Babatunde Agbaje
text: Tasty and fast pizza with excellent customer service and super friendly staff at a great price and value for your money.

name: Vex Xev
text: Blaze is great! Sometimes you have to prod them to add more to your pizza because they can be skimpy, but that is minor. The ingredients are good, there's always a line, but it keeps moving, and the price isn't too bad.

name: Mara Kurowski
text: Different pizzas that are nicely customizable

name: Lars Lofquist
text: Wait time was very short and the amount of options you can choose, even for the specialty pizzas, was extremely nice.

name: Cody Loftin
text: Good Pizza at a good price. Quick service. Employees can be a little rude at times, and the rules for how to proceed through the line seen to change a lot.

name: Taylor Kirkpatrick
text: Great food. Really friendly employees.

name: Marc Isaac
text: Good pizza, quick and friendly service!

name: Minelia Esparza
text: Love it here. The best is that they have vegan cheese.

name: O Ca
text: Really nice staff. The quality is great and they make your pizza fast.

name: Baba Agbaje
text: Excellent customer service and delicious pizza at a great value. Super friendly staff.

name: Natalia Gorlicka
text: Great customer service. They accident folded the pizza and some topping fell off so they offered to remake it 😊

name: Lynise Robinson
text: Amazing combination of hand picked flavors!

name: Ed Stephas
text: Love the choice of toppings.

name: Kelsie Linczer
text: Really good pizza and service

name: Noah Lutter
text: The online order needs to be readvised. My friends and I order and the pizza was close to a hour later than the ready by time was. The pizza cookers need to get more organized, our pizza was at the top of the rack and the pizza cookers kept on taking different pizzas from the bottom even though other people ordered a lot later than us.

name: Gordon Coleman
text: Very friendly, very delicious pizza, very clean

name: Mr. Potatofactory
text: The guy in the red bowtie really made my visit special!! I had really low expectations for this place but, the crew really cares about your wishes and they make it happen. That one guy not only made my pizza himself but he also took my trash and refilled my drink. I will be returning very soon, hungry for more.

name: Kevin Chittenden
text: Love this pizza chain! Quick and easy to order, cool decor, and delicious pizza!

name: matt C
text: This place has horrible parking

name: Therethia Packer-Scott
text: Great place to take your family. Less expensive with great quality food and ingredients.

name: Kyle Magill
text: Great food, but their online ordering pick-up process needs work. I checked in and ended up waiting 40 minutes for my pizza only to realize they forgot I even checked in and never put it in the oven.

name: Mike Abrams
text: One of many new pizza places in campus town.  This is a good one and Worth a visit for a quick personal pizza.

name: Irfan Farhan Mohamad Rafie
text: There are plenty of choices from veggie to meats to gluten-free. The bread is not as crispy as Smokin Oaks(my preference) but has a larger variety of toppings compared to the former. …More

name: Katie Coleman
text: I love how quick the service is! Definitely the best pizza in town! They also have great blood orange lemonade!

name: Dave J
text: Pizza is good, but it is interesting to watch them make the pizza, it's like watching a contest to see who can be the slowest person.

name: Lucas Trewin
text: Love the Art Pizza. Best pizza I've had and I'm a meat lover.

name: Kerry Foster
text: Great pizza, fast service, fresh ingredients!

name: Justin Zavodsky
text: Really good and really fast

name: Carlos Negrin Bolanos
text: Easy to order and amazing taste, would highly recommend for anyone looking for a quick lunch.

name: Alan Gavin
text: Ordered signature meat lovers pizza. Kept requesting more toppings and they would not add more. Cheese did not cover red sauce in many spots. 13 pepperoni slices and one squished up meatball.  All sauce and dough very little substance. Other visits have been great but today was a dispoimtment.

name: Elizabeth Fransen
text: Pizza was very good. Took 5-10 minutes to order and get our food
